items.content_html: Liko is a simple, fast, and lightweight H5 render framework by typescript. Liko is a high-performance rendering engine based on WebGPU, designed for AI. Liko can be used for games, H5 applications, and interactive interactions.

items.content_html: The XML Mapping Comparison Tool is a lightweight web-based utility designed to compare XML mappings between Development (Dev) and Production (Prod) environments. It helps SAP PI/PO consultants and developers quickly identify differences in Receiver Determination mappings, ensuring consistency and correctness.
